de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.simengine
Interface SimulationEventHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
Monitor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFSOperation, AbstractOperation, BTOperation, BTOperationChoking, BTOperationDistribute, BTOperationDownload, BTOperationKeepAlive, BTOperationPeerStarter, BTOperationSendStatistic, BTOperationUnchokingNum, BTOperationUpload, BTOperationValueLookup, CloseOperation, DefaultChurnGenerator, DefaultMonitor, DefaultTransLayer, DownloadOperation, DownloadOperation, GnpSubnet, LookupOperation, MemoryUsageAnalyzer, ModuleTest.Network, ModuleTest.Overlay, Scheduler, ServerJoinOperation, SimpleSubnet, StartOperation, StoreOperation, StoreOperation, UC3MSubnet
public interface SimulationEventHandler

An SimulationEventHandler waits for incoming SimulationEvents events (acts as a listener) and performs various actions depending on the type of the occured event.

Version:
3.0, 11/29/2007
Author:
Sebastian Kaune, Konstantin Pussep

Method Summary
 void eventOccurred(SimulationEvent se)
          This method passes an occured SimulationEvent to its appropriate EventHandler
 

Method Detail

eventOccurred

void eventOccurred(SimulationEvent se)
This method passes an occured SimulationEvent to its appropriate EventHandler

Parameters:
se - the SimulationEvent to handle
